title: (x) 'Got Game?' Slab Serif - Soho Bold {Marc}
content:
Hello everyone!

I´m trying to identify this slab serif. I already tried Whatthefont, but with no results. Hope someone can identify it.

Thanks in advance.

RC

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822001412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_6676.jpg)
author: Calabaça

comments.content:
[Prelo Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822001412/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/prelo-slab/) is quite close, but not identical.The serifs on the 'm' for example, are not the same, and the 'a' counter is slightly different shape. Might be a good substitute if the right font doesn't get named.

- Mike Yanega

Good job Marc. I had Soho picked out to check, but it wasn't at MyFonts, so I toook the closest I could find there.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks Mike.

I looked at Prelo Slab, Zine Slab and Apex Serif individually before using the Subclass browsing method at FontShop. Soho was there waiting under "Slab: Humanist."

Marc

Thanks for your quick answers. My first choice was Prelo Slab, but like Mike said it´s quite close but not the same. Thanks again.

RC
